name: choreographer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is skilled at combining movements into dances to be performed: Balanchine, the well-known choreographer She is a passionate Spanish dancer and choreographer. a ballet/jazz/modern dance/hip-hop choreographer See
choreography
More examplesFewer examplesThe dances this evening are all works from top ballet choreographers. No other choreographer combines such a command of rhythm with such subtle manipulation of dynamics.She is an innovative contemporary choreographer.The dance company often commissions international choreographers whose work is largely unknown.
